name: HomeschoolMasterClasswithMattBeaudreau
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: A series of daily motivational quotes, phrases and strategies from Matt Beaudreau, CEO and founder of Acton Academy Placer and Homeschool Master Class. Matt speaks directly to home-schooling families, motivated teens, and parents looking for front-line, research-based tips! Stay tuned and start listening today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
